{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Motorola |model=WR850G |revision=v2 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=01/30/2004 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf=Gemtek |manuf_model=WRTB-108GM |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=ACQWR850GV2 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4712 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4712 |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM2050 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=ADMtek |sw_model=ADM6996L |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware=DD-WRT,OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.10.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=motorola |oui=00:0C:E5 |oui_eth=00:0C:E5 |default_ch= }} [http://broadband.motorola.com/consumers/products/WR850g/downloads/wr850g_userguide_6.1.4.pdf User guide] {{TechInfoDepot|Motorola_WR850G_v2.0}}
[http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Flash_Your_Motorola_WR850G WR850G on the DD-WRT wiki]
[http://wiki.openwrt.org/oldwiki/OpenWrtDocs/Hardware/Motorola/WR850G WR850G on the OpenWrt wiki] The default SSID is probably '''motorola XXX''' where '''XXX''' is the last three hex digits of the WLAN MAC address (upper case letters).
